1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Term types and related functions.
6
7module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Term
8  ( -- * Term
9    RawJudge,
10    JudgeTerm,
11    JudgeClass,
12    Term, term,
13
14    -- * Term name
15    TermName, TermPath,
16    ToTermName (..),
17    TextualTermName,
18    enslash,
19    stringTermNames,
20    termNameString, termPathString,
21    termNameChars, termNameContent,
22    termNameSign, termNameAltSign,
23    orderingTermName,
24
25    -- * Term name tuple
26    TermName2, TermName3,
27    TermName4, TermName5, TermName6,
28
29    -- * Term index
30    TermIndex, IndexTerm,
31    termP, termN,
32    termsP, termsN, termsPN,
33  ) where
34
35import qualified Data.String                           as St
36import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture              as O
37import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Chars   as S
38
39
40-- ============================================  Term
41
42-- | Judgement material.
43type RawJudge c = (JudgeClass, [Term c])
44
45-- | Term with judgement class.
46type JudgeTerm c = (JudgeClass, Term c)
47
48-- | Name of judgement class, in other words, name of propositional function.
49type JudgeClass = String
50
51-- | Term type: pair of term name and content.
52type Term c = (TermName, c)
53
54-- | Create term.
55--
56--   >>> term "size" 10 :: Term Int
57--   (TermName EQ "size", 10)
58--
59term :: (ToTermName n) => n -> c -> Term c
60term n c = (toTermName n, c)
61
62
63-- ============================================  Term name
64
65-- | Name of term, e.g., @\"size\"@ for the term name @\/size@.
66data TermName =
67    TermName Ordering S.Chars
68    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
69
70instance St.IsString TermName where
71    fromString = toTermName
72
73-- | Path of term names, e.g., term name @\/r\/x@
74--   is correspond to path @[\"r\", \"x\"]@.
75type TermPath = [TermName]
76
77-- | Convert to term name.
78--
79--   >>> toTermName "/a"
80--   TermName EQ "a"
81--
82--   >>> toTermName "+/a"
83--   TermName GT "a"
84-- 
85class (Ord a) => ToTermName a where
86    toTermName :: a -> TermName
87    toTermNameOrd :: Ordering -> a -> TermName
88
89instance ToTermName TermName where
90    toTermName = id
91    toTermNameOrd _ = id
92
93-- | Remove leading slash character.
94instance ToTermName String where
95    toTermName = textualTermName
96    toTermNameOrd = textualTermNameOrd
97
98-- | Strict text.
99instance ToTermName O.Tx where
100    toTermName = textualTermName
101    toTermNameOrd = textualTermNameOrd
102
103-- | Lazy text.
104instance ToTermName O.Tz where
105    toTermName = textualTermName
106    toTermNameOrd = textualTermNameOrd
107
108-- | Integer term name.
109instance ToTermName Int where
110    toTermName = toTermName . show
111    toTermNameOrd ord = toTermNameOrd ord . show
112
113-- | 'Textual' and 'ToTermName' values.
114class (O.Textual t, ToTermName t) => TextualTermName t
115
116instance TextualTermName String
117instance TextualTermName O.Tx
118instance TextualTermName O.Tz
119
120-- | Add necessary slash character indicating term name.
121--
122--   >>> enslash <$> ["foo", "/bar", "+/baz", "-/qux"]
123--   ["/foo", "/bar", "+/baz", "-/qux"]
124--
125enslash :: (O.Textual t) => O.Map t
126enslash n@(O.cut  -> O.Jp '/' _)        = n
127enslash n@(O.cut2 -> O.Jp2 '+' '/' _)   = n
128enslash n@(O.cut2 -> O.Jp2 '-' '/' _)   = n
129enslash n                               = '/' O.<:> n
130
131-- | Decode term name from string.
132textualTermName :: (O.Textual t) => t -> TermName
133textualTermName (O.cut  -> O.Jp '/' n)       = TermName EQ $ S.tChars n
134textualTermName (O.cut2 -> O.Jp2 '+' '/' n)  = TermName GT $ S.tChars n
135textualTermName (O.cut2 -> O.Jp2 '-' '/' n)  = TermName LT $ S.tChars n
136textualTermName n                            = TermName EQ $ S.tChars n
137
138textualTermNameOrd :: (O.Textual t) => Ordering -> t -> TermName
139textualTermNameOrd ord n = TermName ord $ S.tChars n
140
141-- | Convert string to multiple term names.
142--
143--   >>> stringTermNames "/a /b /c"
144--   [TermName EQ "a", TermName EQ "b", TermName EQ "c"]
145--
146stringTermNames :: String -> [TermName]
147stringTermNames = fmap toTermName . words
148
149-- | Encode term name into string.
150--
151--   >>> termNameString $ toTermName "/size"
152--   "/size"
153--
154termNameString :: TermName -> String
155termNameString (TermName EQ n) = enslash (O.tString n)
156termNameString (TermName GT n) = '+' O.<:> enslash (O.tString n)
157termNameString (TermName LT n) = '-' O.<:> enslash (O.tString n)
158
159-- | Encode term name into chars.
160--
161--   >>> termNameChars $ toTermName "/size"
162--   "/size"
163--
164termNameChars :: TermName -> S.Chars
165termNameChars (TermName EQ n) = enslash n
166termNameChars (TermName GT n) = '+' O.<:> enslash n
167termNameChars (TermName LT n) = '-' O.<:> enslash n
168
169-- | Extract internal name.
170--
171--   >>> termNameContent $ toTermName "/size"
172--   "size"
173--
174termNameContent :: TermName -> String
175termNameContent (TermName _ n) = O.tString n
176
177-- | Encode term path into string.
178--
179--   >>> termPathString [toTermName "r", toTermName "x"]
180--   "/r/x"
181--
182termPathString :: TermPath -> String
183termPathString = concatMap termNameString
184
185-- | Sign of term name.
186termNameSign :: TermName -> Ordering
187termNameSign (TermName sign _) = sign
188
189-- | Alter sign of term name.
190termNameAltSign :: Ordering -> O.Map TermName
191termNameAltSign sign (TermName _ n) = TermName sign n
192
193-- | Convert to ordering pair.
194orderingTermName :: TermName -> (Ordering, TermName)
195orderingTermName n@(TermName sign _) = (sign, n)
196
197
198-- ============================================  Term name tuple
199
200-- | Tuple of 2 term names.
201type TermName2 = (TermName, TermName)
202
203-- | Tuple of 3 term names.
204type TermName3 = (TermName, TermName, TermName)
205
206-- | Tuple of 4 term names.
207type TermName4 = (TermName, TermName, TermName, TermName)
208
209-- | Tuple of 5 term names.
210type TermName5 = (TermName, TermName, TermName, TermName, TermName)
211
212-- | Tuple of 6 term names.
213type TermName6 = (TermName, TermName, TermName, TermName, TermName, TermName)
214
215
216-- ============================================  Term index
217
218-- | Term index.
219type TermIndex = Int
220
221-- | Term name and index.
222type IndexTerm = (TermName, TermIndex)
223
224-- | Test present term.
225--
226--   >>> termP 2
227--   True
228--
229--   >>> termP 0
230--   True
231--
232--   >>> termP (-1)
233--   False
234--
235termP :: O.Test TermIndex
236termP = (>= 0)
237
238-- | Test new term.
239termN :: O.Test TermIndex
240termN = (< 0)
241
242-- | Test all terms are present.
243termsP :: O.Test [TermIndex]
244termsP = all termP
245
246-- | Test all terms are new.
247--
248--   >>> termsN [-1, -1]
249--   True
250--
251termsN :: O.Test [TermIndex]
252termsN = all termN
253
254-- | Test present and new terms.
255--
256--   >>> termsPN [1,2] [-1]
257--   True
258--
259--   >>> termsPN [1,2] [-1,0]
260--   False
261--
262termsPN :: O.Test2 [TermIndex] [TermIndex]
263termsPN ps ns = termsP ps && termsN ns
264
